result.eng: Could you warm me a cup of milk?
result.ga: an bhféadfá cupán bainne a théamh dom
result.orig: An bhféadfá cupán bainne a théamh dom
result.html: an bhféadfá cupán bainne a théamh domCould you warm me a cup of milk?
result.ponchtml: an ḃféadfá cupán bainne a ṫéaṁ domCould you warm me a cup of milk?

result.eng: Would you like a cup of coffee?
result.html: ar mhaith leat cupán caifeWould you like a cup of coffee?
result.ponchtml: ar ṁaiṫ leat cupán caifeWould you like a cup of coffee?

result.eng: Would you like a cup of tea?
result.html: ar mhaith leat cupán taeWould you like a cup of tea?
result.ponchtml: ar ṁaiṫ leat cupán taeWould you like a cup of tea?

result.eng: Would you prefer a cup of tea?
result.html: arbh fhearr leat cupán taeWould you prefer a cup of tea?
result.ponchtml: arḃ ḟearr leat cupán taeWould you prefer a cup of tea?

result.eng: I would like a cup of tea please.
result.ga: ba mhaith liom cupán tae le do thoil
result.orig: Ba mhaith liom cupán tae le do thoil
result.html: ba mhaith liom cupán tae le do thoilI would like a cup of tea please.
result.ponchtml: ba ṁaiṫ liom cupán tae le do ṫoilI would like a cup of tea please.

result.eng: Put the cup on the table.
result.ga: cuir an cupán ar an tábla
result.orig: Cuir an cupán ar an tábla
result.html: cuir an cupán ar an táblaPut the cup on the table.
result.ponchtml: cuir an cupán ar an táblaPut the cup on the table.

result.eng: They got relief from the cold when they put their hands around the warm cups.
result.ga: fuair siad faoiseamh ón bhfuacht nuair a chuir siad a lámha timpeall na gcupán te
result.orig: Fuair siad faoiseamh ón bhfuacht nuair a chuir siad a lámha timpeall na gcupán te
result.html: fuair siad faoiseamh ón bhfuacht nuair a chuir siad a lámha timpeall na gcupán teThey got relief from the cold when they put their hands around the warm cups.
result.ponchtml: fuair siad faoiseaṁ ón ḃfuaċt nuair a ċuir siad a láṁa timpeall na gcupán teThey got relief from the cold when they put their hands around the warm cups.

result.eng: Will you have a cup of tea, Cathal?
result.ga: an mbeidh cupán tae agat a chathail
result.orig: An mbeidh cupán tae agat a Chathail
result.html: an mbeidh cupán tae agat a chathailWill you have a cup of tea, Cathal?
result.ponchtml: an mbeiḋ cupán tae agat a ċaṫailWill you have a cup of tea, Cathal?
